summary: HFTextProcessor prepares textual transcripts from HuggingFace datasets for ASR pipelines. It applies optional language‑specific preprocessing, normalizes and cleans the text, can restrict characters to a whitelist, and adds BOS/EOS token IDs and padding to produce uniformly sized token sequences.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, ready‑to‑use text preprocessing layer that converts raw dataset transcripts into clean, token‑indexed strings suitable for training or evaluating speech‑recognition models.
